snippet: Scallops, clams and oysters are the stars of the Greenport Shellabration and restaurant walk on Dec. 8 and 9, but beer and wine will also be on hand.
abstract: Greenport Shellabration festival allows participants to sample bounty of scallops, claims and oysters during restaurant walk through Greenport (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Scallops, clams and oysters are the stars of the Greenport Shellabration and restaurant walk on Dec. 8 and 9, but beer and wine will also be on hand.

headline.seo: What’s a ‘Shellabration’ Without Beer or Wine?
